Title: Species Jump
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Anya Leta, Ron Nyswaner, Anya Leta (staff writer)

Plot: Saul calls an old friend. Wellington has a problem. Carrie enjoys a win.
